part.title: GT &shortversion;: Java WS Core
part.chapter:
GT &shortversion; Java WS Core : System Administrator's Guide System Administrator's Guide
Introduction
This guide contains advanced configuration information for system administrators working with Java WS Core. It provides references to information on procedures typically performed by system administrators, including installation, configuring, deploying, and testing the installation.
This information is in addition to the basic Globus Toolkit prerequisite, overview, installation, security configuration instructions in the . Read through this guide before continuing!
&Java_WS_Core_admin;
